desc: The course provides a capstone to the major. Taught as a seminar, it offers an opportunity for students to integrate their studies of women and gender across disciplines and to become more aware of the intricate web of gender, race, culture, and class that informs women's experiences. Prerequisite: Women's and Gender Studies 121. Offered annually in the spring semester.
name: Sem:Transnation Feminisms
notes: Open to Junior and Senior Women's and Gender Studies majors only, except by permission of instructor. Prerequisite: Women's and Gender Studies 121.
prerequisites: Prerequisite: Women's and Gender Studies 121. Offered annually in the spring semester.
title: Advanced Topics in Women's and Gender Studies
